scripts.aoc: ts-node -e "(async () => { const day = process.argv.slice(1); const { readInput } = await import('./src/utils/readInput'); const { part1, part2 } = await import('./src/' + day + '/solution.ts'); const input = readInput('' + day + ''); console.log('Part 1:', part1(input)); console.log('Part 2:', part2(input)); })()"
